name: tetra (Ricardo Escobar)
description:
Made in a week for my Prototype Studio course at the NYU Game Center. The prompt was "a game that needs no instructions."

There are only 5 levels in this prototype, and the game resets to Level 1 when you complete the last level.

Controls:

Left click on a nearby triangle to move

Left click on the tetrahedron to rotate (clockwise)

R to restart the current level
